lead_paragraph: Thousands of messages released by WikiLeaks offered a look inside an operation that misread the electoral mood, throwing Mrs. Clinton’s campaign off course.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Steve Eder, Farah Stockman, Yamiche Alcindor and Jeremy Merrill.
byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

headline.print_headline: Emails Disclose Clinton’s Strain to Hone Message
headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Campaign Strained to Hone Her Message, Hacked Emails Show

snippet: Thousands of messages released by WikiLeaks offered a look inside an operation that misread the electoral mood, throwing Mrs. Clinton’s campaign off course....
abstract: Emails released by WikiLeaks offer revealing window into inner workings of Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign, painting picture of campaign's missteps in adapting to populist mood that was so prevalent during Democratic primary; also reveal campaign's struggle to present Clinton as agent of change despite career as public figure and politician.
